title: The Emperor's New Groove
writer: David Reynolds, Chris Williams, Mark Dindal
actors: David Spade, John Goodman, Eartha Kitt
plot: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne and his human form with the help of Pacha, a gentle llama herder.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 7 wins & 27 nominations total
